---
title: "Assessment"
---

This unit will be assessed by a single piece of coursework that is to be completed individually. It will be released in two parts, one in week 5 and one in week 9. Details of the coursework will be released on Blackboard.

The final deadline is 1 pm on Thursday of week 11 (4 December 2025). Submit your coursework as a .zip file on Blackboard.
